name: RetrieveAllCompanies
description:
Retrieve all companies from HubSpot CRM.

This tool retrieves all companies from the HubSpot CRM. It uses query parameters to control the information that gets returned, such as filtering or specifying fields. Useful for getting a comprehensive list of companies stored in the CRM.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: paging_cursor_token
parameters.description: The cursor token to fetch the next set of results in a paginated response.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: properties_to_return
parameters.description: List of properties to include in the response. Ignore if not present on the object.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: properties_with_history
parameters.description: A list of properties to return with their history of previous values. This reduces max companies per request.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored. Usage of this parameter will reduce the maximum number of companies that can be read by a single request.

parameters.name: associated_object_types
parameters.description: A list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. Non-existent associations will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: return_only_archived_results
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived results in the response.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
